thread.title: Josh Gad, Chris Pratt and more beg Daisy Ridley for 'Star Wars' spoilers
thread.title_full: Josh Gad, Chris Pratt and more beg Daisy Ridley for 'Star Wars' spoilers

author: USA TODAY
title: Josh Gad, Chris Pratt and more beg Daisy Ridley for 'Star Wars' spoilers
text:
Josh Gad, Chris Pratt and more beg Daisy Ridley for 'Star Wars' spoilers Kelly Lawler , USA TODAY 2:56 p.m. ET Feb. 20, 2017 4 Shares 
Daisy Ridley in 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens.' (Photo: LucasFilm) 
Josh Gad will find out Star Wars: The Last Jedi spoilers from Daisy Ridley, no matter how many celebrities he must enlist to berate the actress. 
The Beauty and the Beast star has been quietly waging his own personal battle to get Ridley to cough up some details on the next movie in a galaxy far, far away. First, he surprised her with the interrogation tactics of one Dame Judi Dench. I enlisted help today in my quest to get the truth from #DaisyRidley #LastJedi #DontRunFromYourFateDaisy #DameJediKnight pic.twitter.com/KiJMYE8H8L â€” Josh Gad (@joshgad) February 8, 2017 
When not even a Dame -- who played the head of a spy agency, we'll remind you -- could get the goods from Ridley, Gad went bigger. He enlistedChris Pratt, Penelope Cruz, Bryce Dallas Howard, Hamilton 's Leslie Odom, Jr. and more for questioning. Oh, and did we mention: a past Star Wars director and a future Star Wars director were there too add to the pressure? 
Ridley doesn't crack, but she does crack a smile. A post shared by Josh Gad (@joshgad) on Feb 20, 2017 at 4:59am PST 
We hope Luke gets lines in The Last Jedi , if only for J.J. Abrams' sake. 
Star Wars: The Last Jedi hits theaters Dec. 15. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2m1v99W Most Popular
